title: BBC Local Live: Sheffield and South Yorkshire on Friday 15 April 2016 - BBC News
summary: man in court charged with attempted murder after police officer attack in sheffield .
police commander praises 'incredibly brave response ' of gleadless officers .
city centre police station closes enquiry desk after windows smashed .
cycling legend sir bradley wiggins to rise in tour de yorkshire .

documents.title: good evening : your live coverage across the day
text: that 's the end of our live updates today , but we 'll be back with more from 08:00 on monday .
scroll down for a full round-up of today 's news across the region .
as sheffield gears up to host the best of the world 's snooker stars , i wonder if world champion stuart bingham is taking inspiration from his surprise victory last year ?
he 'll be hoping to end the so-called `` crucible curse '' in sheffield this year .
no first-time world champion as retained his title the following year since the tournament moved to the crucible in 1977
watch this
author: Jenny Cork
BBC Sheffield news

documents.title: poignant end to final hillsborough memorial service at anfield
text: the final anfield memorial service for the 96 victims of the hillsborough disaster has been held in liverpool .
the hillsborough family support group released 96 white doves at the conclusion of the service .
the annual event had been staged at liverpool 's stadium since the tragedy in sheffield on 15 april 1989 .
flags across the city , including this one at anfield , flew at half-mast

documents.title: sheffield man evicted from council home after trying to blow it up
text: a man from sheffield who tried to blow up his block of flats by sawing through a gas pipe has been evicted from his council home .

stephen burkinshaw , 58 , used a hacksaw to cut through a pipe in his maisonette flat on wharncliffe avenue in wharncliffe side because he said he was annoyed at the noise his neighbours were making .
gas leaked from the property for a day before burkinshaw 's meter ran out .
no-one was harmed in the incident .
he was sentenced to two and a half years in prison last october .
sheffield city council said it had now evicted burkinshaw , who is still serving time in prison , from the property .
author: Liz Roberts
BBC Radio Sheffield, political reporter

documents.title: travel : accident cleared on m1 northbound
text: just letting you know the earlier accident 's been cleared , just rush-hour traffic now in the roadworks area between j32 , m18 ( thurcroft ) and j33 , a630 ( catcliffe )
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: thousands of sheffield children take part music event at city hall
text: around 2,000 children were given a musical treat at a performance of the halle orchestra in sheffield today .
children from 35 schools in sheffield ( 34 primaries and one secondary ) watched the halle perform pieces the children have been learning in class .
the orchestra performed a number of pieces from the bbc 's ten pieces project , which aims to open up classical music to children .
author: Mick Lunney
BBC Local Live, Sheffield

documents.title: travel : slow traffic after accident on m1 northbound
text: slow traffic and one lane blocked on m1 northbound between j32 , m18 ( thurcroft ) and j33 , a630 ( catcliffe )
there 's been an accident involving a van and a car , in the roadworks area .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: sheffield comedian takes comedy to the top of the world
text: nice flag !
sheffield comedian tom wrigglesworth took humour to new heights this morning .
he 's performing just above everest base camp - 5,365 metres above sea level .
alongside three other comedians and 50 fans , tom has trekked for nine days to reach the unusual venue .
all proceeds from the highest comedy gig in the world will go to save the children .
world record holder !
@ twitterid did anyone laugh
@ twitterid let 's not get bogged down in the details .
@ twitterid congratulations from all in sheffield .
enjoy the walk back down .
might even buy a guinness book of records this year .
@ twitterid well done mate .
# wawaw
author: Katie Galbraith
Local Live, BBC Sheffield

documents.title: listen : sheffield united 's boss looks ahead to tomorrow 's trip to chesterfield
text: sheffield united manager nigel adkins has been telling me he plans to name an unchanged starting 11 for tomorrow 's game at chesterfield .
he says it 's reward for the improved performance against gillingham .
author: Andy Giddings
Sports Editor, BBC Sheffield

documents.title: watch : as sheffield prepares for a snooker takeover , some of ronnie the rocket 's best moments
text: as the steel city prepares to become snooker city , here are some of five-time winner ronnie o'sullivan 's most incredible crucible moments .
remember that amazing break of 92 en route to winning the 2012 world championship ?
for full coverage and extras over the world snooker championships , head to bbc snooker online .
it 's almost time !
@ twitterid is taking over tudor sq & @ twitterid it all starts tomorrow # ilovesnooker
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: stanage pole to be replaced this weekend
text: the view from stanage edge in the peak district has to be one of the best in our region .
for 100 years the same huge pole rose from the ancient boundary stones nearby , marking the border between derbyshire and south yorkshire .
it 's been missing for a year and this weekend the replacement pole will be moved into place ; the national park has used traditional techniques and local craft
more with me on bbc look north tonight on bbc1 at 18:30 .
: a new stanage pole is coming to the @ twitterid
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid james vincent - one of the only bbc look north reporters 2 bother with the facts and the ppl .
author: James Vincent
Reporter BBC Look North

documents.title: doncaster woman challenges government over cuts on bbc 's question time
text: `` the tories have been stealing our tax . ''
the fight to save doncaster women 's aid went national last night with campaigner louise harrison 's emotional appeal on the bbc 's question time , which was in doncaster last night .
daniel hannan , a conservative mep said decisions on local services were up to the local council .
author: Jenny Cork
BBC Sheffield news

documents.title: weather : wet weather on the way but will it snow ?
text: wet weather on the way this weekend .
and did i mention ?
a possibility of snow .
( only on high ground ! )
full weather report with me on bbc look north tonight at 18:30 .
author: Keeley Donovan
BBC Look North

documents.title: yorkshire bakery cooplands in 'wage arrears '
text: bakery firm cooplands has admitted it 's having problems paying its staff .
the firm 's head office used to be in doncaster , before announcing hundreds of job losses last year .
cooplands employs over 175 people across yorkshire .
staff at the bakery firm in lincolnshire have walked out after complaining they have not been paid for several weeks .
author: Tom Ingall
Journalist, BBC Look North

text: it 's # friday and soon be # rushhour .
drive home safely .
m1 pretty quiet at mo .

documents.title: sheffield wednesday manager looks ahead to ipswich game tomorrow
text: sheffield wednesday are set to receive a fitness boost with the return of goalkeeper keiren westwood .
i 've been speaking to the owls ' head coach carlos carvalhal ahead of their tie against against ipswich , after last weeks 4-1 defeat at bristol city :
author: Rob Staton
BBC Radio Sheffield

documents.title: hillsborough memorial service begins
text: i 'm at anfield in liverpool where the flag 's at half mast in memory of 96 reds fans who never came home after 15 april 1989 semi-final .

this service marks the 27th anniversary of the disaster in which 96 men , women and children lost their lives attending the fa cup semi final in sheffield 's hillsborough stadium between liverpool and nottingham forest in 1989 .
# hillsborough : revd bolton repeats that bereaved families and their supporters 'will never walk alone ' .
crowd applauds .
author: Ben Schofield
Hillsborough reporter, BBC Radio Merseyside

documents.title: love snooker ? snooker heaven - listen again
text: did you miss snooker heaven on bbc radio sheffield last night ?
three very special guests :
a live studio audience .
and a lot of snooker .
listen again here :
author: Rob Staton
BBC Radio Sheffield

documents.title: olympic hopes : sheffield swimmer makes team gb for rio 2016
text: a sheffield swimmer has made it through to the olym by the narrowest of margins .
max litchfield competed last night in the 400 meters individual medley and clinched his place at rio by three one hundredths of a second .
it was a night of drama !
more on bbc radio sheffield with me after 16:00
author: Howard Pressman
Presenter, BBC Radio Sheffield

documents.title: latest headlines : man appears in court over axe attack on police officer and final hillsborough memorial service to be held at anfield
text: the top stories in south yorkshire this afternoon include :

documents.title: rotherham homeless centre tries to raise £ 17,500 for new kitchen
text: i 'm at the shiloh centre for the homeless in rotherham .
they 're shortly moving to a new building and have set up a crowdfunding page to help with the costs .
the project needs to raise £ 17,500 for a new kitchen by 25 april .
author: Andy Kershaw
BBC Radio Sheffield News

documents.title: wiggins to ride in tour de yorkshire
text: sir bradley wiggins has announced he 'll take time out from his olympic track preparations to ride in the tour de yorkshire .
the 2012 tour de france champion has been focusing his efforts on qualifying for this year 's games in rio .
but he will ride for team wiggins in the three-day race , which runs from friday 29 april to sunday 1 may .
world champion lizzie armitstead is in the women 's one-day race , which starts in her home town otley and follows the men 's route , finishing in doncaster .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: weather latest : gardener 's beware , frosty nights over the weekend
text: it might be april , but there 's cold showery rain over the weekend and hill snow will slowly clear to the north .
# frosty nights over the weekend , gardeners beware !
helen w
@ twitterid @ twitterid you know , you 're such fekkin liars about everything else , i do n't even trust you with with the weather report !
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: sheffield axe attack : nathan sumner appears in court
text: a man has appeared in court charged with the attempted murder of a police officer who was attacked with an axe as she attempted to make an arrest .
pc lisa bates suffered a fractured skull and broken leg , and lost a finger in the attack in sheffield .
nathan sumner , 35 , of plowright close , sheffield appeared at the city 's magistrates court earlier charged with attempted murder and 12 other offences .
he was remanded in custody to appear at sheffield crown court on 13 may .

documents.title: campaign to save doncaster women 's aid goes national
text: the fight to save doncaster women 's aid went national last night with campaigner louise harrison 's emotional appeal on the bbc 's question time .
it 's big lottery funding runs out on 29 april and a fundraising campaign has only raised £ 600 of the £ 90,000 the organisation says it needs to keep going .

there have been calls for doncaster council to step in to save the service but although the authority has offered to help doncaster women 's aid find money , it says it already funds it 's own domestic abuse services and ca n't provide the cash .
campaigners will hope that the national attention can help save a service which has been running in doncaster since 1976 .
author: Kevin Larkin
Doncaster Reporter, BBC Radio Sheffield

documents.title: yorkshire gets ready to celebrate the queen 's 90th birthday
text: the queen is 90 next week !
we want your from her trips to yorkshire .
here are the queen and prince phillip in sheffield last april .
when they visited for the roal maundy service .
the queen handed out maundy money to 178 pensioners at a service in sheffield cathedral .
got a you want to share to mark her birthday ?
email it to us .
author: Jenny Cork
BBC Sheffield, Local Live

documents.title: listen : doncaster boss says he 'absolutely ' wants to be in charge next season
text: i 've been getting the team news from doncaster boss darren ferguson .
he says the decision to loan out curtis main was the right one at the time .
the striker has scored in his last three games for oldham who have now climbed out of the relegation zone where doncaster currently sit .
rovers ' boss also says he wants to stay with the team next season .
listen to the full interview here :
author: Jonathan Buchan
BBC Radio Sheffield Sport

documents.title: watch : doncaster woman 's rant on question time goes viral
text: last night , bbc1 's question time was broadcast from doncaster .
one woman 's rant about david cameron , who she says he `` stripped us of everything '' has gone viral on the internet .
this video from the bbc programme was posted on youtube by imajsa claimant .
author: Jenny Cork
BBC Sheffield, Local Live

documents.title: rotherham united 's neil warnock : `` i 'm definitely going to manage next season ''
text: i 've been talking to rotherham united 's neil warnock .
he 's said he expects `` opportunities '' at the club when his contract at # rufc expires in the summer .
author: Rob Staton
BBC Radio Sheffield

documents.title: children missing school due to poor teeth
text: local councils say the amount spent on removing children 's decayed teeth in england and wales has risen by over sixty per cent in the past five years .
the local government association says a hundred operations to extract multiple teeth are carried out every day in english hospitals .
it blames the excessive consumption of sugary food and drinks .
author: Dan Johnson
BBC News

documents.title: watch : rony robinson rifles through sheffield archives and discovers a treasure
text: if you 're at a loose end later today and you 're partial to a bit of the weird and wonderful , then i 've got something for you .
the sheffield archives are having an open day and they 've got lots of fascinating things to see .
like this , sent to sheffield from the western front 100 years ago .
william broadhead , who went on become a renowned painter of horses , starting sketching in the trenches when he was with the cavalry regiment in world war one .
some of the letters , drawings and poems he sent to his family back home are in the sheffield archives .
author: Rony Robinson
BBC Radio Sheffield presenter

documents.title: hillsborough : final anfield memorial service to be held
text: the final anfield memorial service for the 96 victims of the hillsborough disaster will be held later .
the annual event has been held at liverpool 's stadium since the tragedy in sheffield on 15 april 1989 .
in january , relatives of the victims said they had `` unanimously agreed '' this year 's service would be the last .
author: Everard Davy
BBC Radio Sheffield News

documents.title: sheffield axe attack : police commander praises 'brave ' gleadless officers
text: `` an incredibly brave response '' .
ch supt dave hartley praises officers following an axe attack in sheffield that left a woman police officer with serious injuries .
nathan sumner , 35 , of plowright close , sheffield has been charged with attempted murder along with a string of other offences .
author: Kat Harbourne

documents.title: sheffeld axe attack : 'we need more taser-trained officers ' says police federation
text: there are calls for police to have access to more tasers after an officer was seriously injured in sheffield while she was trying to arrest a man armed with an axe .
four other officers were also hurt during the incident in the gleadless valley area last night .
nathan sumner , 35 , has been charged with a string of offences , including attempted murder .
neil bowles is chairman of the south yorkshire police federation :
author: BBC Look North, Yorkshire

documents.title: windows smashed at sheffield 's snig hill police station by man with hammer
text: the enquiry desk at snig hill police station in sheffield city centre had to be closed last night after damage was caused by a man smashing windows with a hammer .
the front desk , which normally stays open until midnight , shut at 19:45 bst .
it reopened this morning .
a man in his 50s has been arrested on sus of causing criminal damage and remains in police custody .
author: Jenny Cork
BBC Sheffield, Local Live

documents.title: headlines : man charged over sheffield pc axe attack and children 's tooth decay costs councils more than ever
text: headlines : man charged over sheffield pc axe attack and children 's tooth decay costs councils more than ever
author: Everard Davy
BBC Radio Sheffield News

documents.title: your comments : gleadless resident helps injured police officer
text: yesterday we heard that local resident simon ellis saw the attack on a female officer in gleadless on wednesday and helped her :
you 've been sharing your reaction to simon 's story on our facebook page .
top bloke very brave he should be really proud of himself . ''
nice to see there are nice people out there . ''
green all copper should have tazors . ''
really well done you shouĺd feel proud of yourself for putting yourself in danger like that xx ''
author: Andy Kershaw
BBC Radio Sheffield News

documents.title: weather : a cloudy start with showers developing
text: showers could be heavy and thundery later .
light and variable winds and a maximum temperature of 10c ( 50f ) .
author: Jenny Cork
BBC Sheffield, Local Live

documents.title: sheffield pc axe attack : injured officer 'remains in hospital '
text: the female officer , who has not been named , lost a finger when she was attacked with a hatchet after attending a domestic incident in plowright close .
she also suffered a fractured skull and a broken leg .
she was the most seriously hurt of five police officers injured in the attack after she and a male colleague responded to what they thought was a `` routine '' domestic incident .
south yorkshire police said she remains in hospital .

documents.title: breakingman charged over sheffield pc axe attack
text: a 35-year-old man 's been charged atempted murder and a string of other offences following attacks in gleadless on wednesday night , which left a police officer with 'serious multiple injuries ' .
nathan sumner , of plowright close , has been charged with :
he remains in police custody and is due to appear at sheffield magistrates ' court today .
author: Jenny Cork
BBC Sheffield, Local Live

documents.title: good morning : join us for today 's live coverage
text: we 're here until 18:00 for the latest across south yorkshire .
a cloudy morning , with showers developing by the afternoon - full weather report coming shortly .

and we 'll bring you more on the breaking news this morning that , after wednesday night 's attacks in gleadless , during which a woman police officer was seriously injured , nathan sumner , 35 , of plowright close has been charged with attempted murder .
author: Jenny Cork
BBC Sheffield, Local Live
